sentences.en: A low-alcohol cactus lactic acid drink was developed by co-fermentation of microzyme and lactobacillus using malt, cactus, and milk as materials.
sentences.cn: 以仙人掌、牛奶、麦芽为原料，采用酵母菌和乳酸菌共同发酵研制成含低醇的仙人掌乳酸饮料。

sentences.en: Acid production of lactic acid bacteria is sufficient to coagulate milk proteins.
sentences.cn: 乳酸细菌产生的酸足以使乳蛋白质凝固.

sentences.en: Ash sprinted straight ahead. Every muscle pumped and burned with lactic acid.
sentences.cn: 亚什大步向前疾奔. 每一块肌肉都因为乳酸燃烧而疼痛.

sentences.en: Inoculate lactic acid funguses ferment in the mixture of banana and milk.
sentences.cn: 将香蕉泥与牛奶调配接种乳酸菌发酵制成凝固型香蕉酸牛乳.

sentences.en: Kimchi has antibiotic functions as lactic acid bacteria produced in the process of fermentation suppresses growth of harmful bacteria.
sentences.cn: 由于在发酵过程中产生的乳酸菌抑制了有害菌的生长，所以泡菜有抗生素作用。

sentences.en: L lactic acid is an important organic and with multi applications.
sentences.cn: 乳酸是一种有多种用途的重要的有机酸.

sentences.en: Lactic acid containing rice, Shengjinzhike, Xiaoshi Jianwei, Xiehuo cool, very good taste.
sentences.cn: 酸饭含有乳酸菌, 生津止渴, 消食健胃, 清凉泻火, 口感极好.

sentences.en: Lactic acid is an important organic acid of industrial importance.
sentences.cn: 乳酸是一种具有重要工业价值的有机酸。

sentences.en: Lactic Acid: A smooth ( not sharp ) acid created during malolactic fermentation.
sentences.cn: 乳酸: 在苹果乳酸发酵中产生的一种圆滑 ( 不尖锐 ) 的酸.

sentences.en: Main compositions: Witch hazel, Sage extract, lactic peppermint enzyme, Aloe extract.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: 金缕梅 、 鼠尾草精华 、 乳酸薄荷酶 、 芦荟提取液.

sentences.en: Proteomic studies of lactic acid bacteria are still in their initial stages.
sentences.cn: 乳酸菌的蛋白质组研究目前仍处于开始阶段.

sentences.en: Results CVVH, HDF and HD showed definite effects on severe lactic acidosis.
sentences.cn: 结果CVVH 、 hdF和hd治疗乳酸酸中毒疗效明确.

sentences.en: Sulfa drugs themselves are also lactic acid bacteria cells.
sentences.cn: 磺胺类药物本身对乳酸菌亦有杀伤作用.

sentences.en: The drink is fairly acidic with high levels of lactic acid and other acids, so experts advise moderation.
sentences.cn: 这饮料是非常酸的，有高水平乳酸和其它酸，所以专家提醒要节制。

sentences.en: The main diseases are caused by acetic bacteria , lactic bacteria and yeasts.
sentences.cn: 常见的微生物病害有酒花病、变酸病 、 酵母再发酵病和乳酸菌引起的病害.

sentences.en: The somewhat acid flavour is caused by the presence of lactic acid.
sentences.cn: 这种微酸的味道是因为含有乳酸造成的。

sentences.en: To establish a method for determination of Sn in poly ( L - lactic acid ) ( PLLA ) pharmaceutical necessities.
sentences.cn: 目的:建立药用辅料聚L - 乳酸 的锡含量检测方法.

sentences.en: When the fasting gastric acidity, lactic acid easily be killed.
sentences.cn: 空腹时胃内的酸度大, 乳酸菌易被胃酸杀死.

words.tran_cn: 哺乳；哺乳期；授乳（形容词lactational）；分泌乳汁

trans.tran_en: relating to or derived from milk
